name: CanadianTravelAlerts
0:
”Alexa open Canadian Travel Alerts”
”Should I visit Thailand?”
”Alexa ask Canadian Travel Alerts is Mexico safe?”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: canadian travel alerts
des: Planning a trip and need the latest information about your destination country? Let Alexa give you updated travel alerts and advisories directly from the Government of Canada. Just say a country and Alexa will tell you whether it's safe to travel there or it's better to stay home. You can even get in-depth information on topics such as crime, terrorism, passports, visas, public transportation, medical services, emergency numbers, and even what side of the road to drive on.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
